snippet.title: SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest - Faction Trailer - Dwarves
snippet.description:
SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest is OUT NOW!

Oh no! You've come for our moonsilver, haven't you?
We beg you: have some pity!

How could our feeble walls possibly withstand your battering rams?
You'd crush them before we could even think about raining fire down on your heads, wouldn't you?

Not too mention our poor sentries and their mounted crossbows, of course – what are they compared to your mighty cavalry?
Ooh, let's be honest: when did a berserker's axe ever stand a chance against a human sword?

No, kind lady, we're just a bunch of drunken dwarves, we're not a challenge.

So if you still want our moonsilver, come and get it.
---
Steam: http://n.thq.com/l0GK30oJNcq
